Editorial note referring to the upper half of a stamp visible in the document, containing the inscription "CI E MSS. CAM" within an arch that surrounds the upper half of a coat of arms. This stamp appears in other documents signed by Garibaldi and likely belonged to the Autografoteca Campori.
